title: Evernote Premium v7.9.1
description:
Evernote Premium
Evernote app is where you do the work to achieve it. Use Evernote to write your notes of any type, from short to lengthy research list and access your notes on any device. You can collect web articles, handwritten notes and photos to keep all your details in one place. Download evernote and find your work quickly with powerful search.

Evernote Features

Take notes: write in a clean, distraction-free workspace.
Get organized: create notebooks and add tags to wrangle projects.
Access anywhere: keep your work in sync across devices.
Find anything fast: text in notes, photos, and PDFs is searchable.
Share ideas and resources: create a workspace for collaboration with shared notebooks.
Keep up with to-doâ€™s: make to-do lists and check items off as you go.
Harness creativity: capture ideas while theyâ€™re fresh, wherever you are.
Prepare for meetings: draft agendas and to-doâ€™s for next time.
Manage expenses: organize receipts, bills, and invoices to keep expense reports in check.
Plan business travel: save reservations and tickets for simple trip planning.
Evernote Premium Features

Offline access â€“ work anywhere, even without a connection
Unlimited uploads â€“ keep all the files you need to get work done
Better search â€“ search inside Office docs and attachments
Greater privacy â€“ add a passcode lock on mobile
PDF annotation â€“ use shapes and comments to give visual feedback
Unlimited business card scans â€“ scan biz cards, save to contacts, and connect on LinkedIN
